welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Coram, a charming city in the heart of the United States! Known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport mainly handles domestic flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and comfortable waiting areas.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to VIP travelers, providing exclusive services and amenities for a luxurious travel experience.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Brookhaven Airport handles all freight and logistics operations, ensuring efficient and timely delivery of goods.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport houses all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of New Haven Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of New Haven Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
